name: Facility Ten
description:
Please enjoy Facility Ten, a 2D platformer game

Final Modifications:

  1. Added and design Level 3
  2. Added and design Level 4
  3. Gave the player a droppable attack, which places a black hole that damages enemies
  4. Added points for defeating enemies

Credits:

This game was created by Cormac Roth.

Assets provided by Brian Winn.
